item.title: 0001112: Importing a file of contacts may corrupt the contact database
item.description: On v2.3-rc1, importing the attached contact file has corrupted the database: afterwards, it is no more possible to load the contacts on the Main Dashboard.

item.title: 0001117: Corrupted files in the "Backup all files" export
item.description: On a large database (ie: 5000 files), the backup all files feature produces an archive file which contains some corrupted file. Those files are not corrupted when downloaded directly from the project to which they were attached.

item.title: 0000976: Wrong message when working offline on an orgunit
0001010: Impossible to open Sigmah offline
item.description: On v2.2-rc1, if you try to open Sigmah offline, Sigmah will start to be loaded ut will never end to load.

item.title: 0001111: Unexpected error always when getting back online
0001087: Impossible to import in some conditions on Sigmah Central
0000636: Average aggregated value should not take into account empty cells
0001056: Budget ratio field not supported in orgunit models
0001000: Budget ratio as % instead of decimal in exports
item.description: On v2.2-rc1, budget ratio appears as a decimal in global exports and project synthesis, ie: "0,34".<br /> I would be more nicer and easier to understand to users if it would appear as a percentag, ie: "34%".

item.title: 0001003: No more used tables and objects for old budget fields implementation
0001037: Impossible to change Max. limit property on file fields
item.description: On v2.2-rc2, if a "Max. limit" specific property has been set for a list of files field, it is no more possible to set it to null.

item.title: 0001051: Inversed membership link on contact list field member option
0001107: Project global exports empty if contain converted draft projects
0001064: Budget ratio field not updated if source contains computation with computation of linked projects
item.description: On v2.2-rc2, a project budget ratio field won't be updated if one of its data source contains a computation field which itself contains as part of its formula a computation field with linked projects.

item.title: 0000947: Missing a scrollbar in reminders table
0001032: Number fields content exported as text in Global exports
0001033: Missing new line in related project table after new project attached
item.description: On v2.2-rc2, if you add an existing project as a funding source (or funded project) to a project, the existing project won't appear immediately in the related project table as it should.

item.title: 0000879: Display number of active users
item.description: Add a new information in the Admin / Users screen: number of active users.

item.title: 0000987: Missing contact identifiers list in global exports
item.description: In v2.2-rc1, the global exports misses the column "CONTACT_LIST_FIELD_TITLE [contact identifier]" for each contacts list field<br /> This column should contain the comma-separated list of contact identifiers in addition to the column giving the list of contact full names.

item.title: 0001036: Contact list content export
item.description: An Export button should be added on each contact list field to export the content the contact list.

item.title: 0001078: Fields wrongly enabled in closed phases (but save button is correctly hidden)
0001043: No modification actually made after selecting changes made for duplicate
0001116: Unexpected error when before updating a duplicate found after a contact modification
0001042: Unexisting "Organisation name" field in possible duplicates field comparison popup
item.description: On v2.2-rc2, if a duplicate is found after editing an individual contact (scenario of issue <a href="http://www.sigmah.org/issues/view.php?id=918">0000918</a>), the field comparison edition popup will contain an unexisting "organisation name" field.

item.title: 0000914: Unexpected error while updating a contact duplicate
item.description: On v2.2-beta1, if you try to create a contact whose name is exactly or almost like the one of an existing contact, the "Possible duplicates found" popup will open (GREAT!!! :) ).<br /> But if you select one of the duplicates found, and click on the "Update contact" button, you will get an Unexpected error and the contact duplicate will not be updated, but a new contact will actually be created !
